options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

options.name: Set Manually
options.description: Manually set the description

properties.name: toolDescription
properties.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

properties.name: authentication
properties.description: Authentication method to use

options.name: Upload
options.description: Upload an attachment to a specific table record

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete an attachment

options.name: Get
options.description: Get an attachment

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get many attachments on a table

properties.name: tableName
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: id
properties.description: Sys_id of the record in the table specified in Table Name that you want to attach the file to

properties.name: inputDataFieldName
properties.description: Name of the binary property that contains the data to upload

options.name: file_name
options.description: Name to give the attachment

properties.name: attachmentId
properties.description: Sys_id value of the attachment to delete

properties.name: attachmentId
properties.description: Sys_id value of the attachment to delete

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: outputField
properties.description: Field name where downloaded data will be placed

options.name: queryFilter
options.description: An encoded query string used to filter the results
options.hint: All parameters are case-sensitive. Queries can contain more than one entry. more information.

properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

options.name: assigned_to
options.description: Which user is the incident assigned to. Requires the selection of an assignment group. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: assignment_group
options.description: The assignment group of the incident. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: business_service
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

options.name: caller_id
options.description: The unique identifier of the caller of the incident

options.name: category
options.description: The category of the incident. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: close_notes
options.description: The close notes for the incident

options.name: cmdb_ci
options.description: Configuration Items, 'cmdb_ci' in metadata. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

options.description: The description of the incident

options.name: impact
options.description: The impact of the incident

options.name: close_code
options.description: The resolution code of the incident, 'close_code' in metadata. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: state
options.description: The state of the incident. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: subcategory
options.description: The subcategory of the incident. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

options.name: urgency
options.description: The urgency of the incident
